Container.Name: ABS AutoConverter
Container.Overview: ABS AutoConverter automatically converts media in your Plex/Emby/Jellyfin libraries using the ABS API. It supports scheduled conversions, bitrate control, parallel processing, and optional library refreshes. This container is built from the open-source project by shadowplace1, licensed under MIT.

Variable.Name: DOMAIN
Variable.Description: Base URL of your ABS server (e.g. http://192.168.1.10:7878 or http://myABSserver.com)

Variable.Name: LIBRARIES
Variable.Description: Comma-separated list of library IDs to convert (e.g. 1,2,3)

Variable.Name: MAX_PARALLEL_CONVERSIONS
Variable.Description: How many conversions to run at once per library

Variable.Name: LIBRARY_REFRESH_WAIT
Variable.Description: Seconds to wait after refreshing a library

Container.DonateText: If you find this useful, consider supporting the developer.
